resources.string: There was an error calculating results. Are your entries correct?

Select the language in the dropdown menu on the top, currently only english and german are available.

Enter the word you used on the left. Then enter the result of your entry on the right: grey -> 0, yellow -> 1, green -> 2. Then press submit and wait for the results.

On the bottom you find the suggested word by the bot and a list of the remaining words after your first entry.

Use the '↺' symbol to restart.
